svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Average number of children vs child mortality, by the religion of the majority of
Child mortality measures the share of children that die before their fifth birthday. The religion shown for each country is that with
the largest share of followers in that country.
Source: UN Population Division (2017 Revision), Religious Composition - Pew (2017)
